EmailTemplate.subject: RE: Follow up from MBO Partners (1326291139.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
1024x768 Clean false false false EN-US X-NONE X-NONE MicrosoftInternetExplorer4 Hi Ananth
Thank you for the update! Good luck with everything and do not hesitate to reach out to me if you have any consulting opportunities in the future.
Have a great day, Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
Notice: This email and any files transmitted with it are confidential. They are intended solely for the use of the individual addressed. If you have received this email in error please notify postmaster@mbopartners.com and permanently delete the e-mail and files.
From: ananth chandra [mailto:ananthak71@yahoo.com] Sent: Tuesday, January 10, 2012 7:36 PM To: Nicolette Taylor Subject: Re: Follow up from MBO Partners
Hi Nicolette,
I am currently in the process of taking up a full time, however if I am back to consulting, I will definetly go through MBO partners.
Thanks, Ananth
From: Nicolette Taylor <ntaylor@mbopartners.com> To: ananth chandra <ananthak71@yahoo.com> Sent: Tuesday, January 10, 2012 1:57 PM Subject: Follow up from MBO Partners Hi Ananth,
I hope all is well with you! It has been a few months since we last spoke and I wanted to follow up with you to see if you still planned on using MBO for your consulting projects? The last time we spoke I had sent a contract to your client and they never followed up with me so I wanted to find out the status of this project or any others that you may have coming up.
Please provide me with an update and I look forward to hearing from you! Nicolette
___________________________________ Nicolette Taylor Consultant Services Advisor MBO Partners
t: 703.793.6281 f: 703.793.6456 e: ntaylor@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com
